data.title: Help me find my home!
data.solution:
w, h = gets.split(" ").collect { |x| x.to_i }
y = 0
houses = {}

h.times do
    line = gets.chomp  
    line.split('').each_with_index do |c, x|
        next if c == ' '
        houses[c] = [] unless houses[c]
        houses[c].push([x, y])
    end
    y += 1
end

houses.each_value { |g| puts "#{g[0][0]},#{g[0][1]}" if g.length == 1 }
data.statement: After a crazy party, I'm having a hard time to find my home, all what I remember is that it has a different color than any other house in my neighbourhood.

testCases.testIn:

data.stubGenerator:
read w:int h:int
loop h read line:string(w)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
A map of a neighbourhood, every house is represented by one char: its color!
Streets are represented by spaces.
All houses will have the <<same>> color except <<one>>.

<<line 1>>: [[w]] [[h]] width and length of the map
<<[[h]] lines with [[w]] chars each>>
data.outputDescription:
The position of the home which has the unique color. 
[[c]],[[r]] (0-indexed)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

After a crazy party, I'm having a hard time to find my home, all what I remember is that it has a different color than any other house in my neighbourhood.
Input
A map of a neighbourhood, every house is represented by one char: its color!
Streets are represented by spaces.
All houses will have the same color except one.

line 1: w h width and length of the map
h lines with w chars each
Output
The position of the home which has the unique color.
c,r (0-indexed)
Constraints
2≤w≤1000
2≤h≤1000
Example
Input
7 2
GGG GGG
GGR GGG
Output
2,1
